geneSummary: EGFR, a receptor tyrosine kinase, is altered by amplification and/or mutation in lung and brain cancers among others.

mutationEffect.description: The EGFR P596L mutation lies in the extracellular domain of the protein. Expression of this mutation in Ba/F3 and MCF10A cell lines demonstrated it is likely activating as measured by increased cell viability compared to wildtype EGFR (PMID: 29533785).

variantSummary: The EGFR P596L mutation is likely oncogenic.
